title: Amendments to the Institute of Fundamental Studies of Sri Lanka Act, No. 55 of 1981 as amended by Act, No. 5 of 1997
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Patali Champika Ranawaka, Minister of Technology, Research and Atomic Energy, to instruct the Legal Draftsman to draft necessary legislation to introduce amendments   relating to the constitution of the Board of Governors of the Institute, was approved by the Cabinet.
